title: ISA 2 marks
content:
Considering that all my total internal marks lie in the range 35 to 40 for all the courses  , is this enough for getting a sgpa above 8.5 considering an equivalent performance in the ESA's as well

please give some insight , thanks

Educational info : sem 3 cse

comments.body: 35-40 out of 40 marks for every course? I think you can get 10sgpa.
if its ECE
Maybe he means Internals, including assignments and stuff
total marks bruh , i wouldnt be posting here had i gotten 35/40 in all the courses XD😂😂😂
I assume you mean including assignments, then yes I think getting 8.5+ with 35-40 should be pretty straight forward .
How much is the total internals for (including assignments and all)?
70 for 5 credit course and 50 for 4 credit course
Ayo, ATB bro!

Thanks dude! All the best to you too! We got this! 
(Yea tomorrow bt only)
Pass?💀💀
Somehow I am passing idk if I will pass the paper was not great I forgot everything lol I am messed shit
Let's write a backlog together 😋
Yes yes fr
But based on our history I think we are gonna fail backlog exams too 💀
moye moye plays in bg
You are up so early to study SDS?💀💀
yea, i cant fail nah :(

I didn't even start💀💀
( Moye moye)

Yaay, let's write our backlogs together😋😋

You are not even denying it 💀☠️

Quite the opposite actually 😋🤡🤡💀
If you end up getting a concession then give me some money, no?😋🥺🤡
Oh yeah, I would! Expecting the same from you too 😁
My motto is to just pass this semester somehow ✌
Exactly but i wonder what web tech ESA is gonna be like💀💀💀
istg i am so scared 😫
You say that but end up writing the exam very well
You say that but end up writing the exam very well
You say that but end up writing the exam very well
whoa, how can you say that? whoa
Just a guess 🤨
nah bro imma not that great toooo
